detectors.description:
CrofterFinance.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CrofterFinance.sol#85-90) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CrofterFinance.sol#87)
detectors.markdown:

detectors.description:

	- CrofterFinance.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CrofterFinance.sol#67-69)
